Plaid Hat Games [PHG SW01PETO] SHIPPING Continental U.S. - FedEx: $12.95 International (Including AK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; HI) - USPS Priority Mail

Plaid Hat Games (PLD SW01P) Blood will Flow in the Wasted Summerlands! What was once a fertile land of unparalleled beauty was replaced by a wasteland of ice. Now the Phoenix Elves, trapped for millennia in their volcanic halls, have found a Summoning Stone and are ready to seek revenge for the destruction of the Summerlands. But in their way are the Tundra Orcs: frozen reavers with a Stone of their own, as well as plans for grisly conquest. Summoner Wars: Phoenix Elves vs. Tundra Orcs gives players everything they need to join the War for Itharia, as either of these great races. Will you play the Phoenix Elves, whose magic and ferocity burn as brightly as their anger? Or will you play the Tundra Orcs, and bury the world in a graveyard of ice? This Summoner Wars Starter Set provides 2 complete Faction decks, as well as all the materials needed to play games of Summoner Wars.

Summoner Wars: Phoenix Elves vs. Tundra Orcs gives players everything they need to join the War for Itharia, as either of these great races. Will you play the Phoenix Elves, whose magic and ferocity burn as brightly as their anger? Or will you play the Tundra Orcs, and bury the world in a graveyard of ice? This Summoner Wars Starter Set provides 2 complete Faction decks, as well as all the materials needed to play games of Summoner Wars.

Contact for shipping quote. Alaska and Hawaii orders are shipped via USPS. International orders are shipped via USPS First Class (under 4 pounds) or USPS Priority Mail (up to 70 pounds per box). Contact for shipping quote. Orders ship within 1 business day from receipt of payment (5-10 day waiting period on personal checks). Ohio residents will be charged 6.5% sales tax. Thank-you, Mr. B ROCKIN’ B GAMES www.rockinbgames.com mrb.rockinbgames@gmail.com

Shrinkwrap removed but otherwise perfect. I store my games in a pet-free and smoke-free environment and I package my games for shipment with the utmost care. I ship quickly - within 24 hours of receiving payment. Shipping weight is 3 pounds.

SUMMONER WARS LOT with some REALLY nice EXTRAS: #1. Summoner Wars Starter Set: Phoenix Elves vs. Tundra Orcs - OOP and RARE!!! #2. Summoner Wars Starter Set: Guild Dwarves vs. Cave Goblins - OOP and RARE!!! #3. Summoner Wars Premium Board - OOP and RARE!!! *All the above sets are in like NEW condition. Bought this to try and get a game for the wife to play with me. We opened them and only played a few times before she conceded that this type of game just wasn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t for her...my loss is your gain! :) **BONUS #1. Revised (error-free) Thorkur card for the Guild Dwarves (brand NEW and unused) **BONUS #2. COMPLETE SET of ALL 3 promo cards from Plaid Hat Games (all are brand NEW and unused): - KHAN QUESO - SAIROOK - KHEXHU ONLY asking $69.95 for this hard to find lot!!! Stored and played w/care in a smoke free home. Check out my other listings and save on combined shipping! International buyers welcome! Will Ship anywhere in the world! *** Item price reflects a built-in 3.9% cash discount. The discount will remain in place for ANY payment methods not involving paypal credit/debit card payments. *** Paypal balance/bank acct. transfer payments preferred. *** Personal Checks must clear before game ships.

Plaid Hat Games (PLD SWPETO) Blood will flow in the Wasted Summerlands! What was once a fertile land of unparalleled beauty was replaced by a wasteland of ice. Now the Phoenix Elves, trapped for millennia in their volcanic halls, have found a Summoning Stone and are ready to seek revenge for the destruction of the Summerlands. But in their way are the Tundra Orcs: frozen reavers with a Stone of their own, as well as plans for grisly conquest. Summoner Wars: Phoenix Elves vs. Tundra Orcs gives players everything they need to join the War for Itharia, as either of these great races. Will you play the Phoenix Elves, whose magic and ferocity burn as brightly as their anger? Or will you play the Tundra Orcs, and bury the world in a graveyard of ice? This Summoner Wars Starter Set provides two complete Faction decks, as well as all the materials needed to play games of Summoner Wars.
